#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#define N 100005
using namespace std;

int c[N],d[N];
int A[N][2];

int main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)	cin>>A[i][0]>>A[i][1];	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		c[A[i][0]]++;
		d[A[i][0]]++;
		if(A[i][0]==A[i][1])	continue;
		c[A[i][1]]++;
	}
	int ans=10000000;
	bool impossible=true;
	if(n%2==1)	n=(n+1)/2;
	else n/=2;
	for(int i=1;i<N;i++){
		if(c[i]>=n){
			impossible=false;
			if(d[i]>=n)	ans=0;
			else ans=min(ans,n-d[i]);
		}
	}
	if(impossible)	cout<<"Impossible"<<endl;
	else cout<<ans<<endl;
	
	return 0;
}
